import React from 'react'; import SkipCard from './SkipCard'; import './SkipSelection.css'; const SkipSelection = ({ skipOptions, selectedSkip, onSkipSelect }) => { return (

Choose Your Skip Size

Select the perfect skip size for your waste disposal needs. All prices include VAT and delivery.

{skipOptions.length} Skip Options
14 Day Hire
NR32 Service Area
{skipOptions.map((skip) => ( onSkipSelect(skip.id)} /> ))}

🚚 Free Delivery

We include delivery and collection in all our skip hire prices

📋 Permit Handling

We'll help you with road permits if your skip needs to be placed on public roads

♻️ Eco-Friendly

We recycle up to 90% of waste collected, helping protect the environment

); }; export default SkipSelection;
